actions.text: On agreeing to the Larsen (WA) amendment as modified Agreed to by voice vote.
Larsen (WA) amendment (A055) modified by unanimous consent.
Amendment (A055) offered by Mr. Larsen (WA) to the Rules amendment (A001).
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A055) offered by Mr. Larsen (WA) to the Rules amendment (A001).
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Larsen (WA) amendment as modified Agreed to by voice vote.

amends_amendment.description: An amendment consisting of the text of Rules Committee print 114-32 which shall be considered as pending.
amends_amendment.purpose: Amendment consists of the text of Rules Committee print 114-32, as amended, and which was made in order pursuant to H. Res. 507.

description: An amendment No. 13 printed in Part A of House Report 114-326 to add a new section entitled Streamlined Application Process for securing secured loans under the bill.
purpose: Amendment requires the Secretary to provide an expedited process for TIFIA applications that are less than $100 million and backed by revenue.
